item.title: Pressure Stop Fitting Assemblies (Main Entry Doors)

remarks.para: One forward fitting assembly and/or one aft fitting assembly per door (with a total of 10 fittings per aircraft) may be missing or inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: There are no visible defects on other fittings assemblies for the associated door(s),
Cabin altitude auto controller is operative, and
Maximum cabin differential pressure is limited to 5.2 psi.
In Automatic Cabin Altitude control, comply with maximum cabin pressure differential limit of 5.2 by not exceeding the 11,000 feet MSL maximum aircraft altitude.
Flight is limited to 11,000 feet MSL en route altitude.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN DOOR__ PRESSURE STOP FITTING MISSING/INOP – MAX CABIN DIFF PRESSURE: 5.2 PSI". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually inspect remaining fitting assemblies on affected door(s) for defects.
